name: Potion
description: Heal one of your Pokemon by 1 HP.

name: X Speed
description: One Pokemon of choice can move 1 extra space.

name: Firebreather
description: The next Fire attack deals +2 damage.

name: Burglar
description: Ally Fire and Poison types are protected.

name: Swimmer
description: One ally Water Pokemon gains +1 Move.

name: Sailor
description: One ally Water Pokemon gains +1 Power.
